# Invitation to Qualify for Solid Waste Removal Services at Fundy National Park

## Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01026316
*   **Solicitation Number:** 5P300-22-0317/A
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Time

## Background

The Parks Canada Agency invites qualified bidders to submit a response to this Invitation to Qualify for the provision of Solid Waste Removal services at Fundy National Park. Fundy National Park is located in the province of New Brunswick.

## Requirement

The successful bidder will be required to provide all labour, materials, equipment, vehicles, and supervision to ensure the collection and disposal of solid waste at Fundy National Park.

## Period of Contract

The contract will begin on April 1, 2023, and is expected to run until March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for an additional two years.

## Process

Bidders interested in responding to this Invitation to Qualify should obtain the Solicitation Documents from the Government of Canada's Tendering Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca). Addenda and other relevant documents will be released through this service. By submitting a response, Bidders acknowledge that they have reviewed the Solicitation Documents in its entirety.

## Additional Information

National Parks Regulations mandate that all contracted work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

## Contact Information

*   **Name:** Bonnie Knott

### Trade Agreements

*   This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) Mat
